hotelDescription: Welcome to Shady Meadows, a delightful Bed & Breakfast nestled in the hills on Newingtonfordburyshire. A place so beautiful you will never want to leave. All our rooms have comfortable beds and we provide breakfast from the locally sourced supermarket. It is a delightful place.
